Text.val: 03.03.2014 SH SCR18747 Added updated v.GB009A.PO.BANKID for existing BPOR rows in load screen variables task
to prevent error messages that the bank Id does not match with extracted bank ID from IBAN
24.01.2014 JH SCR18672 Added plausi test on extracted bank ID from IBAN and entered bank ID
14.01.2014 SH SCR18565 Added call of GB009C to eliminate intermediate blanks form bankaccount number and IBAN;
Addtional changes: IBAN/SWIFT are now mandatroy; Bank ID also filled via GB009A
11.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
23.04.2012 SH SCR17265 Make sure that first BPOD row starts with BPOD_LINENO = 1; Changed init of BPOR/BPOD fields
-- Only write OLOG, no separate permission required
.. set virtual to enable button OK in parent task
... Bank ID/Account debtor via parameters, sent from OPH101C because of possible
changes in OPH10C are not stored to database when OPH101CTB s activated
... initalizations if no BPOR row exists
... Extracted bankaccount from IBAN must match entered bank account number
... Extracted bank ID from IBAN must match entered bank ID
... Check if at least one desciption row is entered
-- Error is detected, go back to screen
... then re-populate based on memory table contents
-- Finally update BADP_BPOR_ID (only if a new BPOR is stored)
